mapper.select: SELECT t.team_id AS teamId, t.team_name AS teamName, t.url AS teamThumbnailUrl FROM team_member tm JOIN team t ON tm.team_id = t.team_id WHERE tm.user_id = #{userId} AND tm.deleted_at IS NULL AND t.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY tm.created_at ASC

SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name AS nickname, u.email, u.user_thumbnail_url AS profileImageUrl FROM team_member tm JOIN user u ON tm.user_id = u.user_id WHERE tm.team_id = #{teamId} AND tm.deleted_at IS NULL
